task.Question: On June 6, 2023, an article by Carolyn Collins Petersen was published in Universe Today. This article mentions a team that produced a paper about their observations, linked at the bottom of the article. Find this paper. Under what NASA award number was the work performed by R. G. Arendt supported by?

Annotator Metadata.Steps:
1. Google "June 6, 2023 Carolyn Collins Petersen Universe Today"
2. Find the relevant link to the scientific paper and follow that link
3. Open the PDF. 
4. Search for NASA award number
Annotator Metadata.Tools:
1. Web browser
2. Search engine
3. Access to academic journal websites

steps.content: On June 6, 2023, an article by Carolyn Collins Petersen was published in Universe Today. This article mentions a team that produced a paper about their observations, linked at the bottom of the article. Find this paper. Under what NASA award number was the work performed by R. G. Arendt supported by?

plan: Search for the article by Carolyn Collins Petersen published on June 6, 2023, in Universe Today.
Locate the link to the paper mentioned at the bottom of the article.
Access the paper to find the details regarding the NASA award number.
Identify the specific NASA award number under which the work performed by R. G. Arendt was supported.

given_facts: An article by Carolyn Collins Petersen was published on June 6, 2023, in Universe Today.
The article mentions a team that produced a paper about their observations.
R. G. Arendt is associated with the work mentioned in the article.
facts_to_lookup: The paper linked at the bottom of the article in Universe Today.
The NASA award number under which the work performed by R. G. Arendt was supported.
